mean_cn: n. 自信，信心；  adj. 骗得信任的
mean_en: a feeling or belief that you can do something well or succeed at something
word_etyma: confid信任 + ence名词后缀 → confidence 自信，信任
short_phrase: The boy has lots of confidence.
sentence: She really has confidence about how her face looks.
sentence_trans: 她对自己的长相感到非常自信。
